action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains a series of colored shapes, including red, purple, yellow, and orange. The shapes are arranged in a seemingly random pattern, with no discernible order or symmetry. The red shapes are in the upper left and lower left corners, the purple shapes are in the upper middle and lower right, the yellow shape is in the middle, and the orange shape is in the upper right.

Please provide your description of the image you are looking at.
continue
